p: Cycloartanes are triterpenoids and key intermediates in the biosynthesis of phytosteroids, which contain a cyclopropane ring generated by the inclusion of carbon from the methyl at C-10 catalyzed by cycloartenol synthase enzymes [ 18, 53]. The Cycloartanes ( 152â€“ 154) identified in the genus Cedrela are shown in Table 7.
